ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(IF(!ISBLANK(Birth_date_of_2nd_child__c),Birth_date_of_2nd_child__c>= TODAY(), FALSE ), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_Account == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Birth date of 2nd child should not be today or greater than today.
